rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Exit In Progress : assign task to SSM

rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: Exit Process : On moving to in Progress (temporal)

value.stringValue: [Merchant_Special_Process__c].Merchant__c.Name +" "+": Please send the exit email today"

formulas.name: formula_4_myRule_1_A1_9853269524
formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.Merchant__r.Name} +" "+": Please send the exit email today"

value.stringValue:
[Merchant_Special_Process__c].RecordType.DeveloperName = "Exit" && ISPICKVAL ( [Merchant_Special_Process__c].Stage__c, 'In Progress') && ISCHANGED ([Merchant_Special_Process__c].Stage__c ) && [Merchant_Special_Process__c].Merchant__r.Exit_Buyback_Granted__c = False && (ISPICKVAL ([Merchant_Special_Process__c].Merchant__r.Stage_Buyback__c , 'Buyback Run') || ISPICKVAL ([Merchant_Special_Process__c].Merchant__r.Stage_Buyback__c , 'Buyback NMO'))
&& $User.ByPassProcessBuilder__c <> True

formulas.name: formula_myRule_8
formulas.expression:
{!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = "Exit" && ISPICKVAL ( {!myVariable_current.Stage__c}, 'In Progress') && ISCHANGED ({!myVariable_current.Stage__c} ) && {!myVariable_current.Merchant__r.Exit_Buyback_Granted__c} = False && (ISPICKVAL ({!myVariable_current.Merchant__r.Stage_Buyback__c} , 'Buyback Run') || ISPICKVAL ({!myVariable_current.Merchant__r.Stage_Buyback__c} , 'Buyback NMO'))
&& {!$User.ByPassProcessBuilder__c} <> True
